message: I propose we split the money with me getting $60 and you getting $40. This seems fair considering the inflation affects me more than you.
I understand the inflation is in your favor, but your previous offer was too low. Let's meet in the middle.
Let's compromise. I'll take $58 and you take $42. This way, we both get a fair share considering the inflation.
This is my final offer. A 50/50 split is the only fair option considering the inflation will continue to erode the value of this money.  Let's be reasonable and end this.
